name: Tow Truck Simulator: Offroad Car Transporter Full
name_original: Tow Truck Simulator: Offroad Car Transporter Full
description:
Drive huge recovery truck to transport broken cars from the wilderness to the emergency service center! Rescue wrecked cars as a professional tow truck driver, transport cars and have fun with Tow Truck Simulator: Offroad Car Transporter!
Find broken or damaged cars from off-road contests as a tow truck driver and transport it right to the car service! Is it a car accident across the street? Feel like a real tow truck driver with this driving simulator in 3D!
Cars are damaged or broken right after their participation in the off-road racing! Drivers are calling 911! Find out and drive your recovery truck towards the car accident spot. Drive to the current place, park and get broken cars you need with Tow Truck Simulator: Offroad Car Transporter!
Do your transport job within the given time because there are many wrecked cars, which need to be mover to the recovery service! Get them off from the woods, swamps, and hillside with Tow Truck Simulator: Offroad Car Transporter! Upgrade your parking, driving and transporting skills with this amazing 3D simulator!
Tow Truck Simulator: Offroad Car Transporter features:
Realistic tow truck driving simulator
Driving, parking and transporting experience
Lots of damaged cars to transport to the recovery service
Unusual off-road racing experience
Amazing 3D graphics
Join tow truck recovery service team with Tow Truck Simulator: Offroad Car Transporter!
